name: Hello, World!
text: [h1]Some Heading[/h1]After the head tag, you'll find the [b]body[/b] tag. [u]All visual-structural elements[/u] are contained within the body tag. Headings, paragraphs, lists, quotes, images, and links are just a few of the elements that can be contained within the [u]body[/u] tag.[h1]Basic HTML structure[/h1][code format='html']<html><head></head><body></body></html>[/code][note]some note text goes here...[/note]
